pullrequest.title: Better fix for #236 for IMU that doesn't require ABI changes

content.html:
slight efficiency issue, what about something that does:

   if (dt > 0.0)
   {
    ...
   }
   else if (dt < 0.0)  // time went backwards (e.g. reset)
   {
     this->lastMeasurementTime = timestamp;
   }
